de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.base

Interface Session

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConnectionHandshakeRetryListener, SessionBase, TransportListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSession

    public interface Session
extends SessionBase, TransportListener, ConnectionHandshakeRetryListener
    Generic TNC(C/S) session. The session manages a transport connection and is used to communicate thru the underlying connection.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.base.SessionBase

      • Methods inherited from interface de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.transport.TransportListener

        notifyClose, receive

      • Methods inherited from interface de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection.ConnectionHandshakeRetryListener

        retryHandshake
